title: Spotify Trends Analysis (2009-2025)
text: This project investigates global music trends from 2009 to 2025 using the Spotify Global Music Dataset. We aim to understand the characteristics that define a “Global Hit” and how these features have evolved over more than a decade of music history.

title: Spotify Trends Analysis (2009-2025)
text:
2. Data Loading
To ensure reproducibility—a core requirement of the HAX712X course—we load our dataset directly from our organized directory. This dataset contains over 8,000 tracks with detailed features.
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
